reviews.review: Kinda god tier game. Literally the best game ever created. Worth every cent and second spent on it.
i recommend it, its portal 2, what else is there to be said?

Great puzzle game. Love the feeling of escaping from an abandoned factory. Even though the facility is really old and torn apart, some technology is still functional, and the game balances between navigating through waiting lobbies that stayed the same throughout the years and abandoned, broken caverns with worn bridges and stairs.
Overall, great atmosphere and lore, with challenging puzzles.

This game have a great storyline and co op is superduper fun .

Very fun unique game. I played it when it came out years ago and wanted try it again. Just as fun the second time.  

There is some screen shaking, so if that bugs (like me) there may be a few scenes you're trying to speed through.
A truely awesome game with an awesome ending!
